website_summaries.verdict: Choose this bike if you are looking for one for a girl who knows how to ride and wants to explore both paved and more rugged trails.
pros: Built for experienced riders who like to tackle various terrain thanks to the lightweight yet solid build, Shimano rear derailleur, and 21 speeds
cons: Can be time consuming to assemble
Some quality control issues reported, such as pedals and seats that didn't fit onto the bike properly

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike!
customer_reviews.text: I was leery from questionable reviews, but my experience was great. The bike was carefully packed using a lot of foam between parts, everything was in perfect condition. It took me a total of 20 minutes to unpack and put the bike together (I dont read instructions). Most of it comes assembled, you just have to put the front tire, handlebars and seat on. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Myrt

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my daughters 12th birthday (2 month early cause her other one broke). She’s average build for her age. This bike fit her perfect with a little adjusting to the seat height, with room to grow! Hoping it’ll last her at least 2-3 years. She LOVES it!! Husband assembled this bike same day, and took him maybe 20 min. Beautiful bike, excellent quality for the price. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mamabb18Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Daughter love it
customer_reviews.text: my 9 year old daughter loves this bike...she'll grow into it nicely and has already learned how to ride a bigger bike than she's used to. putting it together wasn't the easiest. I grew up fixing bikes, taking them apart, etc. but this bike was a little bit of a pain because the brake wire came loose in the front and putting it back was frustrating b/c the brake wire was unraveling. other than that, i was able to fix it and now my daughter is loving her birthday gift!
customer_reviews.author: Szucceed Ly

customer_reviews.title: Many issues
customer_reviews.text: We have not had a good experience with this bike. We have since found out from a bike store/repair that many people have complained.
customer_reviews.author: capital one

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and a great bike for my daughter. Put it together in 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: James River

customer_reviews.title: great bike
customer_reviews.text: Wife has short legs so this bike worked for her, she is 5"4. Easy to assemble though does require right allen key set.
customer_reviews.author: neal raymond

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality bike. We are very pleased with it and also with the price we paid on Prime Day. Our 11 year old is thrilled and rides it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Kiirstin

customer_reviews.title: Junk with a Mongoose lable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bike for my 9 year old for Christmas. Because of weather, she only just now started riding it. She’s put maybe 2 hours on it. The brakes are trash. They never seemed to work right & then finally, today, she fell & hurt herself because the brake got stuck. I read so many good reviews & I’m so disappointed that once she finally got to ride it, it has been nothing but problems back to back.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Marie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bike easy to put together if you putting together a bike before. And to adjust the brakes just open the book there's four steps to adjust them. Most issues with this bike come from the user not knowing what they're doing. Bought this for my eight year old daughter and she loves it. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Great bike. We freaked out for a while because we couldn’t find the bolts. But they were in there. I’m glad we re-checked all the packaging :)
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Francis

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write product reviews but this one requires one! What a piece of junk. I bought it as a Christmas present so it is now too late to return. My 9 year old Goddaughter who weighs 65 pounds rode it 2 times and it’s already messed up. Gears are working properly, tire keeps locking up, and it’s now so messed up she can’t even ride it. I know I assembled it correctly (which took forever)... it’s just a cheap bike.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great bike for the money, and I’m a Mongoose fan.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I took it to a bike shop because I wanted to be sure everything was adjusted correctly; my daughter fell on the bike and everything kind of shifted, so I had to fix it. I didn’t realize it had 21 speeds, so it’s a little more complex than what I was looking for, but it’s the perfect size for my tall 8 year old (she’s 4’8”), and she will learn the gears.
customer_reviews.author: miriam c.

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Bike
customer_reviews.text: So far my daughter is really happy with her new bike. The gears and speed settings took a little time to completely figure out but after a few weeks she knows the settings and has no problem with going up hills and on trails. This bike is a really good purchase and I recommend it for anyone looking for an affordable bike for their young kids
customer_reviews.author: Kat Gaczorek

customer_reviews.title: Very good bike for the money
customer_reviews.text: The bike is disassembled and does require some mechanical inclination to put it together but is not overly complicated. It is a great starter for the kids that want to experience riding a bike and switch gears as they get into various terrain.
customer_reviews.author: C. Alb

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bime
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble other than adjusting brakes but use your head and you’ll be fine
customer_reviews.author: Matt Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Feminine looking but solid & tough.
customer_reviews.text: Was soo ecstatic that this bike came in when it did during the pandemic. My daughter was thrilled!! The bike seems to work well and be solidly built, the only issue is with the chain which seems to come off quite a bit, but I think it’s user error.
customer_reviews.author: Tomorrah H Stallings

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: This a great bike! Our daughter loves it! My husband had a hard time putting it together so we took it to a bike shop to have them finish. Wanted it to be safe!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great bike at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for the price. My 52" tall, 65 lb, petite 11 year old daughter fits great with the seat in the lowest position. She was able to adjust to the hand brakes and shift gears easily. My husband put it together in about 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: NJ Medic

customer_reviews.title: Loving in it !!😍😍
customer_reviews.text: I love it !!! It’s pretty easy to assemble only thing is you need to know what you’re doing, that’s why my boyfriend took an hour, but other than that bike is perfect size for me, for reference I’m 5’4 Inch 128 lbs . I’ll update in a few months and see if it was really worth it, Price is quite affordable .
customer_reviews.author: Viridiana Cortes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bike for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my 10 year Olds Bday, she loves it. Took about 25 minutes to put together.
customer_reviews.author: kurt

customer_reviews.title: All part were included which made it easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It is a sturdy bike and was easy to assemble. I bought it for my 10-year-old granddaughter who does not know how to ride. She loves it and is trying hard to ride. I would recommend this beautiful bike for anyone that wants a durable bike.
customer_reviews.author: Viola Wright

customer_reviews.title: Solid Entry Level Bike
customer_reviews.text: Shipping aside, overall the bike arrived without any damage. The derailleur needed adjusting, would over shift 1st gear. The graphics on the bike are not put on well. The brakes had all screws loose and the brakes were not aligned correctly. The quality of the bike overall is good, what you would expect from a sub $250 bike. Overall online experience was poor when looking at shipping, the bike was lost and then found and then lost again before finally arriving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LITSEN TO THE BAD REVIEWS I AM NOT JOKING
customer_reviews.text: I was riding it down in windthrop and the chain Came off at the it just started to brake and it wasn’t even up or down hills I only had it for 3 days and it was put together right nothing was put together wrong it is sad 😥
customer_reviews.author: BRIELLE 😁

customer_reviews.title: Bike was supposed to be delivered on a Friday and ...
customer_reviews.text: Bike was supposed to be delivered on a Friday and didn't show up until Monday. Our daughters birthday is Tuesday so we were scrambling to get it together. Tube had a hole in it so $22.00 later we got that fixed. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for the price the only down fall is the fact it took so long to put together
customer_reviews.author: Karen Florian

customer_reviews.title: Mongoose 24” Girls Bike
customer_reviews.text: I expected much better quality from Mongoose. Cons: The twisting gear switch. Lower quality. Heavy weight. Pros: Beautiful paint. Rear suspension.
customer_reviews.author: Munther

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the search for a bike for my daughter who was 8 at the time of purchase and nearly 5ft tall. Very long legs and torso. Regular kid bikes don’t fit her right. This bike was perfect for her and gave her room to grow. It was easy to put together. It rides perfectly, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: pinkdragonfly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bike! My daughter loves it. Perfect size for 11 year old 5' girl.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: No Surprise Packaging
customer_reviews.text: ***WARNING FOR PARENTS*** this item comes with several pictures of the bike around the box. So if you’re purchasing this for your own children, and your mailman rings the doorbell, your kids going to know what their gift is.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa C

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: My eleven year old daughter loves her new bike! It was complicated to assemble, but when a couple friends helped, it was done in no time at all! I love Mongoose, the bikes are so sturdy, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Angelmommy8111

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived defected
customer_reviews.text: This bike looks and feels great, but it arrived with both wheels terribly defected.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4” and this bike was perfect for me, although it was advertised for teens or kids I believe. It’s basic and easy to use. I haven’t ridden a bike in years and my balance isn’t that great so I was afraid to get a full size 26” like I had when I was younger. I like pink, but do wish there had been more color options.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Barsallo

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has ridden this daily since xmas (5 months). It has not had any issues. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Withrow

customer_reviews.title: Missing bike seat clamp
customer_reviews.text: Just received. Great bike. Missing the seat clamp to hold seat in place. Trying to reach seller to get this part! Will update review.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Taker than most 24in bikes
customer_reviews.text: Solid bike, easy to put together. Super cute. It’s taller than most 24in bikes, so just be ware if your kid is just barely at the height for a 24 in bike
customer_reviews.author: th

customer_reviews.title: Walmart brand in Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The brand itself says for itself ))) mongooooose, cheaply made with cheap parts.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 10 y/o girl
customer_reviews.text: Good bike overall but we did have an issue with the pedal falling off but were able to get it fixed. Purchased for a 10 y/o girl and it was the perfect size with room to grow. I luckily found it at at normal price and it shipped within a week. Good purchase overall nice looking bike.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new mountain bike. It’s beautiful. She’s 8 and fits the bike well. Some of the assembly got complicated for me, so I took it in for a safety check. Very happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.author: DEW

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome bike!
customer_reviews.text: What a great bike for my 9 year old. It was missing the nut to secure the seat but Amazon issued a credit immediately to secure the simple part. The bike is better than mine and costs 1/4 the price!
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Great bike for my 11 yo daughter. She really loves the bike.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: Missing both pedals when I went to assemble it for my daughter's birthday. Kinda disappointing when your kid cannot ride her brand NEW bike because it doesn't have a key part of a bicycle. Otherwise seems pretty good quality...will update when I purchase pedals and it can be ridden. Will stay 1 star until then.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Brake cracked in under 24 hours
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this bike for less than 24 hours. It tipped over because of odd kick stand placement and the brake CRACKED off! Literally, broken-unrideable. I’d love to be able to rewrite this review once she’s ridden it. Seems like a nice bike, but now wondering about the quality.
customer_reviews.author: sb

customer_reviews.title: Great bike to grow with
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 year old who is tall. She absolutely loves it and she will be able to grow into it. Feels very solid and sturdy. I felt it was a bit pricey but if it stays for the long haul it’ll be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: mishkamummy

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong
customer_reviews.text: Great quality bike. Quality components for s bike in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Fun bike
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her bike!! Well built and fun bright design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bike defective. ( not from seller but from factory)
customer_reviews.text: Bike is pretty but defective.currently in bike shop right now trying to get repaired. All gears will not work. Tried adjusting according to manual and no luck.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bike. It was easy to assemble and 2 months in its working great and has seen many miles.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Aulisi

customer_reviews.title: Bike was not assembled correctly
customer_reviews.text: When I pulled the bike out of the box the handlebars were on backwards. The brakes and gears were not installed correctly. The rear tire had a punctured tube. I pretty much had to reassemble the whole bike myself. Are blind people assembling these bikes? Ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: JoLynne Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike and easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Overall good bike and no major issues on assembly or parts not fitting or missing. The only issue so far was a squeaking noise at first under the seat suspension that I sprayed some WD40 and fixed the noise. No complaints so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Good bike
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good bike for the money. 8 year old daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best bike to progress her riding ability at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is AWESOME. My daughter is 10 and now loves to ride bikes with us. This is the perfect starter bike for young girls ready to advance their riding ability and distance. The bike is made will and solid. Easy to assemble and maintain. She loves her bike.
customer_reviews.author: Ma6hine

customer_reviews.title: Good product may be little bit challenging to assemble if you know nothing about bikes
customer_reviews.text: Overall good, I however kind instructions difficult to follow, handle bar was not fixed and didn’t come with tool to tighten it
customer_reviews.author: SAHIL

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a kid bike. We trail ride and street, this bike works at all levels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bike for my daughters 11th birthday and she loves it! We live in the mountains on the grounds of a church camp. The terrain is pretty hilly and she rides everywhere! She is 5'1" tall and the bike fits her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Assembly not easy
customer_reviews.text: The manual is horribly written. It is very generic. Assembly was not easy. The bike had scratches right off the box. Hope the seller can rectify.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Bike at the price. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: This bike seems great, easy to assemble so far with myself and my 11 year old daughter. The only problem is that it was delivered without the nut to attach to the seat clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Schutte

customer_reviews.title: Great bike.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. Great bike for the money and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Daran Van Koevering

customer_reviews.title: The bike is beautiful and came on time
customer_reviews.text: The bike is beautiful and came on time. However, the front fork is damaged, bent and rusting. The box was fine so I'm not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney

customer_reviews.title: Not properly working upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Front wheel was not true and derailer was rubbing against the chain when delivered. I don’t know how to fix these and am not willing to pay a bike store to repair when it hasn’t even been ridden. Will return
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Lucy Aldridge

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Junky bike. I would hope you build better bikes for your granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bike
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, everything intact and only had to adjust the front brakes slightly and inflate the tires. All around quality is very good. I was impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bike is amazing and my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I like the design most especially the gears. It’s not easy to assemble, but it works perfectly.❤️
customer_reviews.author: Akm Mahfuz

customer_reviews.title: Not even slightly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not like the rugged, well built Mongoose that I had growing up.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda V

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bike! My daughter is very excited to use this!
customer_reviews.author: A. Jacquinot

customer_reviews.title: Bike Broke.....sad
customer_reviews.text: The back gears already went out on the bike. The bike needs returned but I am not sure how to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Bike bummer
customer_reviews.text: No left brake pad, left peddle needs a tap to screw in, poor packaging. Seems like it was thrown around.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Duran

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts, not easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Horrible had missing pieces it wasn’t easy to assemble and it was heavy
customer_reviews.author: Mirvette Judeh

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it it works so well and I have never had my own bike befor
customer_reviews.author: Christina Dicke

customer_reviews.title: Really disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an Easter gift. It was not easy for me to put together. After one month of light use, the rear grip shifter is frozen in 7th gear. So I either have to buy a grip shifter on my own to replace it or disassembled the bike that took me forever to put together and by the grace of god, find a box big enough to ship it back. Frustrated
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Grumann (Loki)

product_meta.title: Mongoose Exlipse Full Dual-Suspension Mountain Bike for Kids, Featuring 15-Inch/Small Steel Frame and 21-Speed Shimano Drivetrain with 24-Inch Wheels, Kickstand Included, Pink
product_meta.description: The Mongoose Exlipse 24" girl's full suspension mountain bike is the perfect bike for your youngster to cruise around , go to school or enjoy the bike paths. The Exlipse is equipped with a strong but lightweight steel frame with front and rear suspension, the front & rear linear pull brakes provide all condition breaking for sure stops and the 21 speeds with Shimano derailleur provide smooth and precise shifting.
feature_bullets: Steel frame is lightweight and strong
Adjust the brake cables and shoe position during assembly

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
